articles.title: Booster may be needed for those with Johnson & Johnson COVID-19 vaccine shot as Delta variant spreads - CNA
articles.description: NEW YORK: Infectious disease experts are weighing the need for booster shots of the Pfizer/BioNTech or Moderna mRNA-based vaccines for Americans who received Johnson & Johnson's one-dose vaccine due to the increasing prevalence of the more contagious Delta co…

articles.author: TSN.ca Staff
articles.title: Guerrero Jr. homers, takes back AL lead from Ohtani - TSN
articles.description: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. has done it again. The Toronto Blue Jays slugger hit a third-inning home run for his 25th of the season, re-taking the American League homer lead all by himself after Shohei Ohtani led off Friday's game at Tropicana with his 24th.
articles.content:

articles.author: Daniela Desantis
articles.title: Is Paraguay set to make bitcoin legal? Don't bet on it - Reuters
articles.description: In the wake of El Salvador's dramatic move to make bitcoin a legal tender, a world first, the internet has been buzzing with rumors that another Latin American country may be set to follow in its footsteps: Paraguay.
articles.content: A representation of the virtual cryptocurrency Bitcoin is seen in this picture illustration taken June 14, 2021. REUTERS/Edgar Su/IllustrationASUNCION, June 25 (Reuters) - In the wake of El Salvador'… [+2183 chars]

articles.title: Biden pledges US support to embattled Afghanistan leaders - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: President Biden offers American commitment to Ghani, Abdullah as US troops withdraw and Taliban fighters gain ground.

articles.title: US Ex-Police Officer Sentenced To Over 22 Years For George Floyd Murder - NDTV
articles.description: Former policeman Derek Chauvin was sentenced to 22 and a half years in jail Friday for murdering African American George Floyd, a killing that sparked America's biggest demonstrations for racial justice in decades.
